injectables.name: SkeletonService

directives.name: NgSkeletonDirective

inputsClass.name: ngSkeleton
inputsClass.rawdescription:
If `true` this shows skeleton loader in place of dom element.
It will take the height and width of the dom element
inputsClass.description: If true this shows skeleton loader in place of dom element. It will take the height and width of the dom element

inputsClass.name: ngSkeletonComponent
inputsClass.rawdescription: This can be used to show a custom component as a loader, by default the inbuilt `NgSkeletonDefaultLoaderComponent` component is rendered
inputsClass.description: This can be used to show a custom component as a loader, by default the inbuilt NgSkeletonDefaultLoaderComponent component is rendered

inputsClass.name: ngSkeletonData
inputsClass.rawdescription:
This can be used to pass any object data to the skeleton component
`ShinyLoaderData` - default type
inputsClass.description: This can be used to pass any object data to the skeleton component ShinyLoaderData - default type

inputsClass.name: ngSkeletonHideOnLoading
inputsClass.rawdescription: If `true` the dom element will be hidden with visibility: hidden
inputsClass.description: If true the dom element will be hidden with visibility: hidden

directives.name: NgSkeletonLoader

components.name: CustomLoaderComponent
NgSkeletonComponent

inputsClass.name: data
inputsClass.rawdescription: This prop will get the data from `ngSkeletonData` attribute
inputsClass.description: This prop will get the data from ngSkeletonData attribute

inputsClass.name: loaderComponent
inputsClass.rawdescription: This can be used to show a custom component as a loader, by default the inbuilt `NgSkeletonDefaultLoaderComponent` component is rendered
inputsClass.description: This can be used to show a custom component as a loader, by default the inbuilt NgSkeletonDefaultLoaderComponent component is rendered

inputsClass.name: loading
inputsClass.rawdescription: If `true` the ng content will be hidden
inputsClass.description: If true the ng content will be hidden

components.name: NgSkeletonPercentLoaderComponent
NgSkeletonShinyLoaderComponent

modules.name: NgSkeletonModule

variables.name: BasicFullSize
variables.defaultValue:
(args: DirectiveType) => ({ props: args, template: `

Second paragraph with some content

`, })
